Convert incident object to dataframe

Source: R/conversion.R
as.data.frame.incidence.Rd

Convert incident object to dataframe

# S3 method for incidence
as.data.frame(x, ...)

Arguments

x

An incidence() object.
...

Not used.

Examples

dat <- data.frame(dates = Sys.Date() + 1:100,
                  names = rep(c("Jo", "John"), 5))

dat <- incidence(dat, date_index = dates, groups = names)
as.data.frame(dat)
#>       bin_date names count
